description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种县级行政区，通常因当地有特殊的厂矿而设立，许多特区实行政企合一的管理体制。
description.en: A type of county-level administrative division in the People's Republic of China, usually established due to the presence of special factories and mines in the area. Many special districts implemented a government-enterprise integration management system.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，是中国共产党领导的社会主义国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia, it is a socialist state led by the Communist Party of China.

en: County-level administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第三级地方行政区，位于地级行政区之下，乡级行政区之上。
description.en: The third level of local administrative division in the People's Republic of China, below the prefecture-level and above the township-level.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国现存的唯一一个特区，为大型煤矿区。
description.en: The only remaining special district in the People's Republic of China, it is a large-scale coal mining area.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guizhou province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西南部的一个省份。
description.en: A province in the southwest of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1963年撤销友谊县设立友谊特区，实行与国营友谊农场场区合一的体制，1964年恢复友谊县建制。
description.en: In 1963, Youyi County was abolished and Youyi Special District was established, implementing a unified system with the state-owned Youyi Farm. In 1964, Youyi County was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省已撤销的地区。
description.en: A former prefecture in Heilongjiang province, China.

description.zh-cn: 1964年至1967年间曾设立为伊春特区，实行伊春林业管理局与特区政企合一的管理体制。
description.en: From 1964 to 1967, it was established as Yichun Special District, implementing a government-enterprise integration management system with the Yichun Forestry Administration.

zh-cn: 大兴安岭林区会战指挥部
大兴安岭特区人民委员会

description.zh-cn: 为开发大兴安岭林区而设立的专区级行政单位。初期名为大兴安岭特区，与黑龙江大兴安岭林业管理局实行政企合一的管理体制。1970年改名为大兴安岭地区。
description.en: A prefecture-level administrative unit established for the development of the Daxing'anling forest area. Initially named Daxing'anling Special District, it implemented a government-enterprise integration management system with the Heilongjiang Daxing'anling Forestry Administration. It was renamed Daxing'anling Prefecture in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最北端的省级行政区。
description.en: The northernmost provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因大庆油田而设立的城市。1965年成立时名为安达特区，实行仿大庆油田的政企合一模式。1979年更名为大庆市。
description.en: A city established due to the Daqing Oil Field. When founded in 1965, it was named Anda Special District and adopted a government-enterprise integration model similar to the Daqing Oil Field. It was renamed Daqing City in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military leader, and diplomat. He was one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国石油工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国石油工业部
en: Ministry of Petroleum Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，负责管理中国的石油工业。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing China's petroleum industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任石油部副部长、大庆会战指挥部指挥，并兼任安达特区工委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Petroleum Industry, commander of the Daqing Battle Command, and concurrently served as the Party Secretary of the Anda Special District.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任大庆石油会战工作委员会政治部主任，并兼任安达特区区长（安达市市长）。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Political Department of the Daqing Oil Battle Working Committee and concurrently served as the District Mayor of Anda Special District (Mayor of Anda City).

description.zh-cn: 1965年建立时为七台河特区，与七台河矿务局实行政企合一管理体制。1970年改称七台河市。
description.en: Established as Qitaihe Special District in 1965, it implemented a government-enterprise integration management system with the Qitaihe Mining Bureau. It was renamed Qitaihe City in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 位于黑龙江省七台河市的煤炭企业。
description.en: A coal enterprise located in Qitaihe City, Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 1946年至1953年间存在于江苏省的县级行政区，因盐场而设立。
description.en: A county-level administrative district that existed in Jiangsu Province from 1946 to 1953, established due to salt fields.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政区，为江苏省的前身之一。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, one of the predecessors of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省地级市。在1964年至1971年间曾被设立为专级的铜陵特区。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Anhui Province. Between 1964 and 1971, it was established as the prefecture-level Tongling Special District.

description.zh-cn: 河南省地级市。在1964年至1969年间曾被设立为地级的平顶山特区，实行政企合一，由煤炭部和河南省双重领导。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Henan Province. Between 1964 and 1969, it was established as the prefecture-level Pingdingshan Special District, implementing government-enterprise integration under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Coal Industry and Henan Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部
en: Ministry of Coal Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，负责管理中国的煤炭工业。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing China's coal industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中原地区的一个省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region in the Central Plains of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 石灰窑工业特区特派员办事处

description.zh-cn: 湖北省地级市。其前身为1949年设立的大冶工矿特区（县级），1950年撤销特区并设立专级的黄石市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hubei Province. Its predecessor was the Daye Industrial and Mining Special District (county-level) established in 1949. In 1950, the special district was abolished and the prefecture-level Huangshi City was established.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省已撤销的专区。
description.en: A former prefecture in Hubei province, China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1952年间存在于湖南省的县级特区，后并回新化县。
description.en: A county-level special district that existed in Hunan Province from 1950 to 1952, later merged back into Xinhua County.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省已撤销的专区，为现邵阳市的前身。
description.en: A former prefecture in Hunan province, China, the predecessor of the current Shaoyang City.

description.zh-cn: 为建设攀枝花工业基地而设立的城市。1965年成立时名为攀枝花特区，实行政企合一，后更名为渡口市，1987年再更名为攀枝花市。
description.en: A city established for the construction of the Panzhihua industrial base. When founded in 1965, it was named Panzhihua Special District, implementing government-enterprise integration. It was later renamed Dukou City, and then renamed Panzhihua City in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事战略家、理论家和中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China, which he ruled as the chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

en: Southwest Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西南地区的派出机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Communist Party of China in Southwest China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部
en: Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，负责管理中国的冶金工业。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing China's metallurgical industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region in Southwest China.

description.zh-cn: 为开发开阳磷矿而设立的特区，与开阳磷矿矿务局合署办公。1968年撤销后并入开阳县。
description.en: A special district established for the development of the Kaiyang phosphate mine, operating jointly with the Kaiyang Phosphate Mining Bureau. It was abolished in 1968 and merged into Kaiyang County.

description.zh-cn: 贵州省的省会。
description.en: The capital of Guizhou province.

description.zh-cn: 贵州省贵阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Guiyang City, Guizhou Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guizhou province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一，曾任国家计委主任、国务院副总理。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Director of the State Planning Commission and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 为开发中国西南地区煤炭资源而设立的指挥机构，后被六盘水地区革命委员会取代。
description.en: A command organization established for the development of coal resources in Southwest China, later replaced by the Liupanshui Regional Revolutionary Committee.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家经济委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，负责宏观经济管理。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for macroeconomic management.

description.zh-cn: 贵州省已撤销的县。原名六枝县，1966年更名为郎岱县，1970年并入六枝特区。
description.en: A former county in Guizhou Province. Originally named Liuzhi County, it was renamed Langdai County in 1966 and merged into Liuzhi Special District in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 为开发水城煤矿而设立的特区。1970年，原水城县并入该特区。1987年撤销，分设为钟山区和水城县。
description.en: A special district established for the development of the Shuicheng coal mine. In 1970, the original Shuicheng County was merged into this district. It was abolished in 1987 and divided into Zhongshan District and Shuicheng County.

description.zh-cn: 贵州省六盘水市下辖的县。1970年曾被撤销并入水城特区，1987年恢复设立。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Liupanshui City, Guizhou Province. It was abolished and merged into Shuicheng Special District in 1970, and was re-established in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guizhou province, China.

description.zh-cn: 贵州省六盘水市代管的县级市。1966年设立盘县特区，1970年原盘县并入特区。1999年恢复盘县名称，2017年更名为盘州市。
description.en: A county-level city administered by Liupanshui City, Guizhou Province. Panxian Special District was established in 1966, and the original Pan County was merged into the district in 1970. The name Pan County was restored in 1999, and it was renamed Panzhou City in 2017.

nodes.id: 黔西南布依族苗族自治州

zh-cn: 黔西南布依族苗族自治州
en: Qianxinan Buyei and Miao Autonomous Prefecture

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省下辖的自治州。
description.en: An autonomous prefecture in Guizhou province, China.

description.zh-cn: 为服务贵州汞矿而设立的万山特区，与汞矿合署办公。经历撤销和恢复后，于2011年与原县级铜仁市部分乡镇合并为新的万山区。
description.en: Wanshan Special District was established to serve the Guizhou mercury mine and operated jointly with the mine. After being abolished and restored, it was merged with parts of the former county-level Tongren City in 2011 to form the new Wanshan District.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省已撤销的地区，为现铜仁市的前身。
description.en: A former prefecture in Guizhou province, China, the predecessor of the current Tongren City.

description.zh-cn: 特区是中华人民共和国的县级行政区之一。
description.en: The Special District is one of the county-level administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1967年，六枝特区划归新成立的六盘水地区（后为六盘水市）领导。
description.en: In 1967, Liuzhi Special District was placed under the leadership of the newly established Liupanshui Prefecture (later Liupanshui City).

description.zh-cn: 友谊特区时期受合江地专区领导。
description.en: During its time as Youyi Special District, it was under the leadership of Hejiang Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 大兴安岭特区的地方行政工作受黑龙江省政府领导。
description.en: The local administrative work of the Daxing'anling Special District was under the leadership of the Heilongjiang Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来视察大庆油田时，肯定了工农结合、城乡结合的建设方式，推动了后来安达特区（大庆市前身）的建立。
description.en: During his inspection of the Daqing Oil Field, Zhou Enlai affirmed the construction method integrating workers and peasants, and town and country, which promoted the later establishment of the Anda Special District (predecessor of Daqing City).

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国石油工业部

description.zh-cn: 安达特区（大庆市前身）成立后，受石油工业部与黑龙江省的双重领导。
description.en: After its establishment, Anda Special District (predecessor of Daqing City) was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Petroleum Industry and Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 安达特区（大庆市前身）成立后，受石油工业部与黑龙江省的双重领导。
description.en: After its establishment, Anda Special District (predecessor of Daqing City) was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Petroleum Industry and Heilongjiang Province.

position.en: Party Secretary of Anda Special District

description.zh-cn: 徐今强在担任石油部副部长、大庆会战指挥部指挥的同时，兼任安达特区工委书记。
description.en: While serving as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Petroleum Industry and Commander of the Daqing Battle Command, Xu Jinqiang also served as the Party Secretary of Anda Special District.

position.zh-cn: 安达特区区长（安达市市长）
position.en: District Mayor of Anda Special District (Mayor of Anda City)

description.zh-cn: 李荆和兼任安达特区区长（安达市市长）。
description.en: Li Jinghe concurrently served as the District Mayor of Anda Special District (Mayor of Anda City).

description.zh-cn: 七台河特区（后为七台河市）建立后，属合江地区管辖，直至1983年升格为省辖市。
description.en: After its establishment, Qitaihe Special District (later Qitaihe City) was under the jurisdiction of Hejiang Prefecture until it was upgraded to a prefecture-level city in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 七台河特区与七台河矿务局实行政企合一管理体制，一体办公。
description.en: Qitaihe Special District and Qitaihe Mining Bureau implemented a government-enterprise integration management system and operated as a single entity.

description.zh-cn: 1949年4月21日苏北行署区成立后，淮北盐场特区直属其管辖。
description.en: After the establishment of the Subei Administrative Region on April 21, 1949, the Huaibei Salt Field Special District was directly under its jurisdiction.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国煤炭工业部

description.zh-cn: 平顶山特区实行政企合一，由煤炭部与河南省双重领导，以煤炭部领导为主。
description.en: Pingdingshan Special District implemented government-enterprise integration and was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Coal Industry and Henan Province, with the Ministry of Coal Industry taking the primary role.

description.zh-cn: 平顶山特区由煤炭部与河南省双重领导。
description.en: Pingdingshan Special District was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Coal Industry and Henan Province.

description.zh-cn: 大冶工矿特区（黄石市前身）属大冶专区管辖。
description.en: Daye Industrial and Mining Special District (predecessor of Huangshi City) was under the jurisdiction of Daye Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 锡铁山特区属邵阳专区管辖。
description.en: Xitieshan Special District was under the jurisdiction of Shaoyang Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在中央工作会议上指出要采取紧急措施加快攀枝花工业基地的建设，直接推动了攀枝花特区的设立。
description.en: At a Central Work Conference, Mao Zedong pointed out the need for urgent measures to accelerate the construction of the Panzhihua industrial base, which directly promoted the establishment of the Panzhihua Special District.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来批示同意攀枝花成立特区政府，并指示仿照大庆油田的政企合一模式。
description.en: Zhou Enlai approved the establishment of a special district government in Panzhihua and instructed that it should follow the government-enterprise integration model of the Daqing Oil Field.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央西南局向中央提交了《关于成立攀枝花工业区政府的请示》，建议成立工业区人民政府。
description.en: The Southwest Bureau of the CPC Central Committee submitted a "Request on the Establishment of the Panzhihua Industrial Zone Government" to the Central Committee, proposing the establishment of an industrial zone people's government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 攀枝花特区的企业工作以冶金部领导为主。
description.en: The enterprise work of Panzhihua Special District was primarily led by the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 攀枝花特区的地方工作以四川省人民委员会领导为主。
description.en: The local affairs of Panzhihua Special District were primarily led by the Sichuan Provincial People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 开阳特区隶属于贵阳市。
description.en: Kaiyang Special District was subordinate to Guiyang City.

description.zh-cn: 在讨论“三五”计划的中央工作会议上，毛泽东对时任国家计委主任的李富春谈话，强调西南三线建设要抓紧。
description.en: During a Central Work Conference discussing the Third Five-Year Plan, Mao Zedong spoke with Li Fuchun, then Director of the State Planning Commission, emphasizing the need to press ahead with the Third Front construction in the southwest.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家经委批准成立西南煤矿建设指挥部。
description.en: The State Economic Commission approved the establishment of the Southwest Coal Mine Construction Command.

description.zh-cn: 六枝特区由西南煤矿建设指挥部委员会与安顺专区双重领导。
description.en: Liuzhi Special District was under the dual leadership of the Southwest Coal Mine Construction Command Committee and Anshun Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 六枝特区由西南煤矿建设指挥部委员会与安顺专区双重领导。
description.en: Liuzhi Special District was under the dual leadership of the Southwest Coal Mine Construction Command Committee and Anshun Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 原郎岱县并入六枝特区。
description.en: The former Langdai County was merged into Liuzhi Special District.

description.zh-cn: 水城特区设立后由毕节专区领导。
description.en: After its establishment, Shuicheng Special District was led by Bijie Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 水城特区隶属于六盘水地区。
description.en: Shuicheng Special District was subordinate to Liupanshui Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 原水城县被撤销，并入水城特区。
description.en: The original Shuicheng County was abolished and merged into Shuicheng Special District.

relationships.target: 黔西南布依族苗族自治州

description.zh-cn: 盘县特区设立后由兴义专区（黔西南州前身）领导。
description.en: After its establishment, Panxian Special District was led by Xingyi Prefecture (predecessor of Qianxinan Prefecture).

description.zh-cn: 盘县特区隶属于六盘水地区。
description.en: Panxian Special District was subordinate to Liupanshui Prefecture.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 万山特区受冶金工业部和铜仁专区的双重领导。
description.en: Wanshan Special District was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and Tongren Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 万山特区受冶金工业部和铜仁专区的双重领导。
description.en: Wanshan Special District was under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and Tongren Prefecture.
